```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

Read in the data

```{r}

data = tibble(files = list.files(here("data/soil"))) %>% 
  mutate(data = map(files, ~ read_csv(here(paste("data/soil/"), .x))))



```
